Brief History July 1, 1958: Taipei Rong was established and officially opened on November 1, 1959. The first dean was Dr. Lu Zhide.1971: According to the instructions of the Executive Yuan, Chiang Ching-kuo, the Taipei Rong Association and the National Defense Medical College jointly established Yangming Medical College (now National Yangming University) to train medical personnel.September 16, 1969: The fifth President of the Republic of China, Jiang Zhong, was involved in a car accident in Yangmingshan and was immediately sent to Taipei Rongji for treatment. Before his death in 1975, Jiang Zhongzheng received treatment at Taipei Rong.1981: Established the Taipei Branch of the Taipei General Station in Taichung.1985: The first test-tube baby in Taiwan was born in the hospital.1988: The seventh President of the Republic of China, Chiang Ching-kuo, died in Taipei Rongzhong; Taipei Rongtai Central Branch was independently the Taichung Veterans General Hospital.1990: Established Taipei Rongrong Kaohsiung Branch in Kaohsiung.1993: Taipei Rongong Kaohsiung Branch is independent of Kaohsiung Veterans General Hospital. 2004: Ms. Jiang Fangliang, the former president's wife, died in Taipei. Source: The hospital was established on July 1, 47, the beginning of the year, in March 48, the door, emergency operations, officially opened on November 1 of the same year. The land area is 30.356936 hectares, and the total floor area of __the building is 545,203.83 square meters. The main buildings include Zhongzheng Building, Siyuan Building, Changqing Building, Outpatient Building, Zhide Building, Nervous Regeneration Center, Physical Disability Center and Power Center. Initially, 600 beds were set up, and the medical service targets were limited to the officers and men who were retired from the Taiwanese government. They were opened year after year and were honored by the public, public, labor, agriculture, fishery and the general public. The first, second and third outpatient buildings were built one by one. The number of outpatients increased from the initial number of more than 200 people per day to about 8,000 daily. In response to the increase in outpatient visits, the number of beds has been expanded. Currently, there are 2,991. The hospital has 6048 employees (1051 physicians, 2706 nursing staff, 1359 technicians, 431 administrative staff, 501 technicians), and constitutes a strong medical team equipped with advanced medical equipment to accurately diagnose patients. Various diseases. In order to implement the government's purpose of caring for the people, the two branches of Taichung and Kaohsiung were established in the central and southern parts of Taiwan; the Taichung branch opened on October 31, 71, and in July 77, it became the Taichung Veterans General Hospital; the Kaohsiung branch in 79 years. It opened on October 31 and became the Kaohsiung Veterans General Hospital on July 1, 1982. Support the medical operations of 12 Veterans Hospitals affiliated to the counseling society. In July of 1987, the Daxin Xinshe Clinic was set up in the Wolong Street of Taipei City to provide doctors and doctors to provide high-quality medical services for more than 4,000 senior citizens in the area. In 1989 and 1990, he successively hosted the Taipei City Guandu Hospital and the first hospital commissioned by Yilan Hospital to open a public hospital, so that local residents can also obtain the same level of medical services as the National Medical Center. In June 1991, he cooperated with the medical technology of the Medical Center of the Foundation, and benefited residents of the Eastern District of Taipei. Under the hard work of the dean and colleagues, the hospital is currently listed as a national medical center, shouldering the three major tasks of patient medical services, medical personnel training and medical research and development, and cooperating with the national medical policy to fulfill the government's responsibility to take care of people's health. . The hospital established the National Yangming Medical College in 60 years. After completion, it was handed over to the Ministry of Education. It has been reorganized into a university and has cultivated numerous professional medical personnel. The school also accepts students from all public and private medical medical colleges in the country to come to the hospital for practice, trainee and further studies, and organize various workshops. The trainees are all over the country and abroad. In the first year of the year of 86, the company established the earliest Rongyang Digital Medical Library in China, providing digital medical resources such as medical e-books and electronic periodicals rich and novel by Rong Zong and Yang Ming colleagues. In the 52nd year of the Republic of China, the American businessman Mr. Kebo donated the "Keber Medical Science Research Center" of the hospital. It was the first hospital to establish a medical research department in China. Under the premise of both basic and clinical, the cultivation of medical research talents. Developed a number of leading domestic research results. In order to industrialize the research results and benefit the people's livelihood, the hospital has actively promoted industry-university cooperation and has seen results. The medical science and technology building is a smart multi-functional research space that combines cutting-edge facilities such as basic, clinical, information technology and laboratory animal centers and meets safety and environmental standards. It will be the first in China to meet the excellent pharmaceutical products. Clinical Trial Program (GCP) Clinical Research Ward, medical research that meets Good Laboratory Practice (GLP) and biosafety level 2-3 research facilities (BL2-BL3), and animal care facilities that meet international standards Building. It can be expected that the hospital will be able to go up to the next level in hospital science research. In recent years, the hospital is dedicated to nerve repair and regeneration, human brain science and cognitive function research, functional brain nerve angiography, brain nerve information, stem cell research, genetic engineering, reproductive technology, cord blood transplantation, bioimage integration, electrocardiography, The development of advanced medical technology such as electronic medical records has achieved great results. For more than 40 years, the hospital has been relentless, adhering to the "customer-oriented" customer-oriented service concept, committed to medical technology innovation, service quality improvement, providing patients with all-round medical care, convenient medical treatment. Environmental and human services. In the future, the hospital will continue to adhere to the service concept of "seeking illness and pursuing excellence" and carrying out the development and growth of medical services, teaching and training, and medical research. We will seek "humanity" and "efficiency" as our core competitiveness. Health and well-being. Ps is good, where I was born.

The problems with teeth can sometimes be far more complicated than most people can imagine. Very fortunate to see the experience of several users to share, so that they are at their fingertips, have the opportunity to go to the Northern Territories endodontics for treatment.Because I had no previous knowledge about pulp disease, there was no previous pain in my fillings, and I learned later that the nerves may be inflamed, even though the appearance and even the radiographs seem to fill or intact teeth The case of necrosis, but after filling teeth will be more painful or more serious inflammation.Knowing the medical information of Bei Rong's endodontics department, the teeth that have been replenished are no longer pain but also grow pustules. Since the appearance of the teeth and the X-ray before the pustule look good, even in the case of severe pain in a few teeth Many times a month to seek medical advice, most doctors said that no further observation and treatment, may therefore lose the opportunity to complete treatment before the nerve necrosis. Finally, Bei Rong after several months of root canal treatment, even after a few months after root canal sealing pustule still not eliminated, but also accepted the apical resection surgery, very grateful to Feng Yuxian physicians intentions of treatment.In its own example to share with you, if the teeth make up but there is a painful situation, when the doctor blindly only to observe and not to deal with treatment, or can only be unplugged, you can choose to hospital dental pulp disease If there is any other way of handling the specialist examination, it may be possible for you to feel less painful and the treatment process may be much shorter.
